message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $175. This exceptional value includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive 30-day satisfaction guarantee and free shipping. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the quality and benefits we're confident you'll appreciate.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit higher than my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $140?  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I'd like to counter with a price of $155. This includes everything you're looking for in the package, plus some additional perks exclusive to our valued customers. I hope this meets within your budget and allows you to enjoy the benefits of our premium product.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. $155 is still a little more than I'm comfortable spending. Would you be willing to go down to $150?  That's my absolute limit, but it would allow me to purchase the product today.
